docs.snippet: As Europe clamors to know how Britain plans to implement its decision to leave the European Union, new Prime Minister Theresa May is giving little away, but her strategy is becoming clear....
docs.lead_paragraph: As Europe clamors to know how Britain plans to implement its decision to leave the European Union, new Prime Minister Theresa May is giving little away, but her strategy is becoming clear.

headline.main: Britain's May Prepares for Brexit Talks, Keeps Europe Guessing
headline.print_headline: Britain's May Prepares for Brexit Talks, Keeps Europe Guessing

docs.snippet: The European Union must be less "politically correct" and act firmly to protect citizens from fears of immigration, terrorism and economic globalisation if it is to survive after Brexit, a senior EU official told leaders on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union must be less "politically correct" and act firmly to protect citizens from fears of immigration, terrorism and economic globalisation if it is to survive after Brexit, a senior EU official told leaders on Tuesday.

headline.main: Post-Brexit EU Summit Must Offer Voters Security-Tusk
headline.print_headline: Post-Brexit EU Summit Must Offer Voters Security-Tusk

docs.snippet: Germany, France and Italy should not be allowed to dictate the European Union's response to Britain's planned exit from the bloc, Austria's finance minister said, adding he was surprised how relaxed the EU response to the vote has been....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany, France and Italy should not be allowed to dictate the European Union's response to Britain's planned exit from the bloc, Austria's finance minister said, adding he was surprised how relaxed the EU response to the vote has been.

headline.main: Austria Says Wrong if Germany, Italy, France Dominate Brexit Debate
headline.print_headline: Austria Says Wrong if Germany, Italy, France Dominate Brexit Debate

docs.snippet: German economic growth  will nearly halve in 2017 as Brexit and other risks hit exporters, the DIW institute said on Thursday, although it predicted a pick up to 1.9 percent this year due to strong domestic demand....
docs.lead_paragraph: German economic growth  will nearly halve in 2017 as Brexit and other risks hit exporters, the DIW institute said on Thursday, although it predicted a pick up to 1.9 percent this year due to strong domestic demand.

headline.main: German Growth Expected to Halve in 2017 as Brexit Bites
headline.print_headline: German Growth Expected to Halve in 2017 as Brexit Bites

docs.snippet: Global accountant Deloitte has called on Britain's government not to clamp down on skilled migrants following Brexit, saying it could backfire on the economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Global accountant Deloitte has called on Britain's government not to clamp down on skilled migrants following Brexit, saying it could backfire on the economy.

headline.main: Deloitte Urges UK Not to Restrict Skilled Migrants After Brexit
headline.print_headline: Deloitte Urges UK Not to Restrict Skilled Migrants After Brexit

docs.snippet: British Prime Minister Theresa May will not hold a parliamentary vote on Brexit before formally triggering Britain's withdrawal from the European Union, The Daily Telegraph reported on Saturday, without specifying sources....
docs.lead_paragraph: British Prime Minister Theresa May will not hold a parliamentary vote on Brexit before formally triggering Britain's withdrawal from the European Union, The Daily Telegraph reported on Saturday, without specifying sources.

headline.main: British PM to Trigger Brexit Without Vote by Lawmakers: Telegraph
headline.print_headline: British PM to Trigger Brexit Without Vote by Lawmakers: Telegraph

docs.snippet: German business morale deteriorated sharply in August posting the steepest monthly drop since the height of the euro zone debt crisis in 2012, a survey showed on Thursday, in a sign that Brexit has weighed more heavily on sentiment among executive...
docs.lead_paragraph: German business morale deteriorated sharply in August posting the steepest monthly drop since the height of the euro zone debt crisis in 2012, a survey showed on Thursday, in a sign that Brexit has weighed more heavily on sentiment among executives.

headline.main: Brexit Hits German Business Morale, Ifo Index Plunges
headline.print_headline: Brexit Hits German Business Morale, Ifo Index Plunges

docs.snippet: Nigel Farage, a key figure in the successful campaign to get Britain out of the European Union, lent his support to Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump on Wednesday, saying Trump represented the same type of anti-establishment movement th...
docs.lead_paragraph: Nigel Farage, a key figure in the successful campaign to get Britain out of the European Union, lent his support to Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump on Wednesday, saying Trump represented the same type of anti-establishment movement that he masterminded in his own country.

headline.main: Brexit Leader Nigel Farage Addresses Trump Rally, Bashes Clinton
headline.print_headline: Brexit Leader Nigel Farage Addresses Trump Rally, Bashes Clinton

docs.snippet: The cost of a basket of popular supermarket items rose 1 percent in July, the second straight monthly increase, a comparison website said on Tuesday, as fallout from Brexit hits prices on the high street....
docs.lead_paragraph: The cost of a basket of popular supermarket items rose 1 percent in July, the second straight monthly increase, a comparison website said on Tuesday, as fallout from Brexit hits prices on the high street.

headline.main: UK Shoppers Feel Brexit Bite as Grocery Prices Rise
headline.print_headline: UK Shoppers Feel Brexit Bite as Grocery Prices Rise

docs.snippet: Global liquidity is likely to tighten after Britain's vote to leave the European Union but the impact on China will be minimal and it will continue to grow at a reasonable rate, a senior Chinese central bank official was quoted as saying on Friday...
docs.lead_paragraph: Global liquidity is likely to tighten after Britain's vote to leave the European Union but the impact on China will be minimal and it will continue to grow at a reasonable rate, a senior Chinese central bank official was quoted as saying on Friday.

headline.main: Brexit Impact Minimal for China-Central Bank Official
headline.print_headline: Brexit Impact Minimal for China-Central Bank Official
